mapper.select: SELECT M.CMS_CD , M.UP_CMS_CD , M.SGRP , M.CMS_NM , M.MTYPE , M.LTYPE , M.ODR , M.DEP , M.USE_YN , M.WDP_YN , CASE WHEN M.MTYPE = 'LNK' THEN ( SELECT L.CONT FROM CMS_CONT_LINK L WHERE L.CMS_CD = M.CMS_CD ) ELSE NULL END AS CONT FROM CMS_MENU M WHERE SGRP = 'S01' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY UP_CMS_CD, DEP, ODR
SELECT CASE WHEN A.DEP > 3 THEN ( SELECT CMS_NM FROM CMS_MENU B WHERE A.UP_CMS_CD = B.CMS_CD ) ELSE CMS_NM END AS CMS_NM FROM CMS_MENU A WHERE CMS_CD = #{cmsCd}

SELECT P.NT_NO , P.TITLE , P.LNK_URL , P.IMG_TXT , F.ATCH_FILE_ID , F.FILE_STRE_COURS , F.STRE_FILE_NM , F.ORIGNL_FILE_NM , F.FILE_EXTSN FROM CMS_POPUP_ZONE P LEFT JOIN COMTNFILEDETAIL F ON P.IMG = F.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%h%i') BETWEEN P.SDT AND P.EDT AND P.USE_YN = 'Y' AND P.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT P.NT_NO , P.TITLE , P.IMG_TXT , F.ATCH_FILE_ID , F.FILE_STRE_COURS , F.STRE_FILE_NM , F.ORIGNL_FILE_NM , F.FILE_EXTSN FROM CMS_POPUP_ZONE P LEFT JOIN COMTNFILEDETAIL F ON P.IMG = F.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%h%i') BETWEEN P.SDT AND P.EDT AND P.USE_YN = 'Y' AND P.DEL_YN = 'N'

select t1.* from ( select 1 as tab, CMS_CD , BRD_NO, TITLE, convert(CONT,varchar(200)) as CONT ,date_format(REG_DT , '%Y-%m-%d') as YMD from cms_cont_ntc where CMS_CD = #{brd1} order by BRD_NO desc limit 5 ) as t1 union all select t2.* from ( select 2, CMS_CD , BRD_NO, TITLE, convert(CONT,varchar(200)) ,date_format(REG_DT , '%Y-%m-%d') as YMD from cms_cont_ntc where CMS_CD = #{brd2} order by BRD_NO desc limit 5 ) as t2 union all select t3.* from ( select 3, CMS_CD , BRD_NO, TITLE, convert(CONT,varchar(200)) ,date_format(REG_DT , '%Y-%m-%d') as YMD from cms_cont_ntc where CMS_CD = #{brd3} order by BRD_NO desc limit 5 ) as t3 union all select t4.* from ( select 4, CMS_CD , BRD_NO, TITLE, convert(CONT,varchar(200)) ,date_format(REG_DT , '%Y-%m-%d') as YMD from cms_cont_ntc where CMS_CD = #{brd4} order by BRD_NO desc limit 5 ) as t4

SELECT B.NT_NO , B.TITLE , B.LNK_URL , F.ATCH_FILE_ID , F.FILE_STRE_COURS , F.STRE_FILE_NM , F.ORIGNL_FILE_NM , F.FILE_EXTSN FROM CMS_BANNER B LEFT JOIN COMTNFILEDETAIL F ON B.IMG = F.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%h%i') BETWEEN B.SDT AND B.EDT AND B.DEL_YN = 'N'

select * from popup_info where DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') between DATE_FORMAT(substr(start_date,1,8),'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(substr(end_date,1,8),'%Y-%m-%d') and is_html='Y'
AND NUM = #{NUM}
